titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of impact aid to certain school districts.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 3/10/1987--Introduced. Entitles a local educational agency to receive impact aid payments when: (1) the population of the school district is below 22,000; and (2) the United States owns Federal property aggregating 40 percent or more of the total assessed value of the district's real property.
